note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Adds a menu button to the top right mac menu with an option to start & stop tomcat.
body:
### About
This app will make you life easier when developing with Tomcat (guaranteed).

### Installation
1. Download the **[Tomcat Quick.dmg](https://github.com/downloads/Eyal-Shalev/Tomcat-Quick/Tomcat%20Quick.dmg)** from the downloads page.
2. Open the Disk image.
3. Copy the **Tomcat Quick.app** to your Applications folder.
4. Launch the app.

### Screenshots
![Tomcat Quick Screenshot](http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8447/7801729560_825fabb4c4_m_d.jpg)

### Authors and Contributors
@Eyal-Shalev (me) is the main contributor.
If you have any suggestions or want to improve this app, the code is available in the branch.

### Contact
Having trouble with Tomcat Quick? contact eyalsh@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll be happy to help you sort it out.
name: Tomcat Quick
